Drinking water
Women are ensured access to sufficient drinking water (extra 1 litre of clean water per day).
Malaria management in pregnancy
In areas where malaria is endemic, sulphadoxine-pyrimethamine can be administered through 
clinics at the beginning of the second and third trimesters. Encourage women to use an 
impregnated bed net during pregnancy. Advise women that they must seek immediate medical 
attention for episodes of fever.
